.. _astro-population:

*******************************************************************
Astrophysical source population models (`gammapy.astro.population`)
*******************************************************************

.. currentmodule:: gammapy.astro.population

Introduction
============

The `gammapy.astro.population` module provides a simple framework for population synthesis of 
gamma-ray sources.
